price: Ovo je lijep spomen! A one koji se grijeha budu klonili čeka divno prebivalište,
arabic: هَٰذَا ذِكۡرٞۚ وَإِنَّ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ لَحُسۡنَ مَـَٔابٖ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: hādhā dhik'run wa-inna lil'muttaqīna laḥus'na maābin
